column1: One cornhole board, a bean bag for each contestant, and some tape to mark off the board. Starting from the bottom of the board, after each round, move a horizontal line of tape up the board by about 3 inches until it reaches the hole.
column2: Throw your bean bag onto the cornhole board. It must land on the board above the tape line, or sink through the hole.
column3: Any contestant who misses the board or lands their bean bag below the tape line is out. The first contestant(s) out get 1 point and so on until the last contestant(s) in get points equal to the number of contestants.
